website_summaries.verdict: Kids really enjoy this scooter that works a bit like riding a bike.
pros: Easy for kids to learn how to use
Assembly is easy and does not take a long time
Works with an up and down peddling motion
cons: This scooter can get going pretty fast, it is best to wear a helmet for this one

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had just bought the other scooter
customer_reviews.text: Good price but hard to ride. I'm 5ft 2 and 120 lbs. My son is 10 and around 4ft 2. When you petal and need to turn the scooter is easily off balance. I guess if you are on a straight and very smooth pavement than it would be easier to ride. I wish it had 2 wheels on the back to help with weight as I peddled. Would not recommend if your child is new to scooters or not super athletic.
customer_reviews.author: meredith

customer_reviews.title: Super fun scooter
customer_reviews.text: Super fun scooter! My daughter rode it from house to house selling her Girl Scout cookies as I walked behind her, pulling the wagon. I love it that I can ride it , too! :)
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Gerat

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this for age 10 and up
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old is unable to use this. It is very large and heavy/hard for him to peddle. I would recommend this for age 10 and up, as some adults have trouble with it as well, especially going up hill. The product was made well and sturdy.

customer_reviews.title: A scooter that works out more than one leg!

product_meta.title: Yvolution Y Flyer Kids Pedaling Stepper Scooter - Suitable for Ages 7 and Up
feature_bullets: PREPARE FOR LIFT-OFF - Push the limits with what you can do on a scooter! The Y Flyer is an innovative kid stepper scooter that propels forward for an insanely fun ride.
YOUNG & FUN - It’s fast, it’s cutting edge and it’s one of the most stylish ways to cruise around and turn heads! Recommended for ages 7 and up; max weight 220 lbs.
FOLDABLE - In those brief moments when the scooter isn’t in use, the frame even folds down for carrying around town and easy storage at home or in the car.
SAFE & SECURE - Two decks instead of one and anti-slip footplates are designed to provide a strong grip for kids and more secure ride. There’s even a quick-response brake for increased control.
WARRANTY - Quality is all we ask from our product and service. We offer 100% guarantee and it's easy to contact us via email or phone.
